tool_description: No. 1 rated U.S listed stock and options data provider with the lowest cost. The cloud based API has a simple interface and return easy to consume data in JSON format for options prices.
name: Stock And Options
title: Stock And Options

api_list.name: Options
api_list.description: Return Stock and Options Data for given ticker
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-and-options.p.rapidapi.com/options/aapl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-and-options.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-and-options.p.rapidapi.com/options/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-and-options.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
